column5: Well i left oshawa about 4am down the 401 to picton for my first walleye outing this fall,it was quite cold first thing,but it was a nice sunny day to be on the water,i met up with don & mike from ottawa a.k.a badger shark,and i set up my lines just east of the ferry,well it was a tough morning with just 1 small fish,and thats it,but man i sure was marking fish down deep,40ft plus !!!! and i was putting lures right to them for hours,and no takers,but after seeing bait at that depth several times i stuck to that program,and i knew sooner or later,one of those big hooks on my graph were walleye and that there was got to be one that was hungry !!!so i thought,well after doing tons of lure changes,i knew it wasnt the color,so i just rode it out,and had most of the 3 or so miles of adolphus reach east of the ferry all to myself,so after several hours, Down dips the in-line planner board,and after feeling several head shakes i had a nice fat fall quinte walleye on !!!!so after i landed him,i hooked back up with don & mike above the ferry,and they took a few nice pics of my fish before i released him to grow,and be my next 14lber !!!!...lol..lol.. so all in all it was nice to get down there for the first of many fall trips to the bay,and my back seemed to hold out pretty good,as im feeling a little stiff,but none the worse for wear !!! so im sure there will be lots more fall reports to come, hope you enjoy the picture....cheers   shawn      here is a picture of don & mike   here is a pic of the ferry crossing in front of me,as you can see it was a very nice morning before the wind came up
Thats a nice walleye Shawn nice to see you down there tried to get you on the radio but no luck  Rob
Great report and pics fishindevil  That is one beauty eye you caught there    WTG Thanks for sharing Leechman
Very nice fish Shawn.  Perserverence pays off for you  Way to go bud.  Joey

Nice reports and pics, even better is the walleye you caught...beauty fish!!!!! I think you guys are lucky to be near BOQ, especially for icefishing season....the size of the walleye i've seen pictures of always amazed me....10/10 for perserverance.
Nice fish.  How was it after the wind picked up?  forrest
W.T.G nice eye glad the bay introduced itself to you lol  Hawg Hunter
Nice   Glad to see that you are on the mend and able to get to Quinte.  Cannot imagine a fall without your Quinte reports, looking forward to more

Hey Shawn, good to finally meet you!  Congrats on the eye, she was a nice fish.  We only got the one and it was a resident so not to big.  All and all a nice day on the bay which is not that common this time of year.  Cant wait till the weekend, we will be there from Friday till Sunday and we will get some!  By the way Shawn, my friend who was with me is Eric not Mike but hey maybe I will just start calling him Mike too.  Hopefully see you next weekend.  Don
Way to go Bud.Nice eye for sure .Soryy I couldn't make it Saturday.But I am glad you made out o.k. Dan
Great report and very noice Wall-ice!!!  Glad to see you're healing well and able to wrassle those mean-   fish into submission!!!
Nice to meet you Shawn, didn't get to talk much, maybe next time. A good fish for your effort, well done...
good job guys 1 fish is better then a black&white

Hey Shawn, Great to see you getting into the fall action. Best of luck this week chasing that cash. I would love to get out and fish for myself but I am guiding all week  Keep the reports com'in.  -sheldon
Nice fish and a beatiful fall day. Hey, at least you weren't playing bumper boats and that's gotta be worth something as well!
WTG Shawn, that's a very impressive pickeral and good to hear your back is healing.  You'll be laying a beating on those mosnster Quinte eyes in another month.

Nice looking eye Shawn....it's only going to get better down there on the BOQ within the next little while!!...Hoping to get down to the Bay with Don and Mike (Eric) a couple of times before the ice sets in!!
Great stuff Shawn!  You sure worked hard for that fish...glad you were able to get a nice pic of it too!  Hope the back held up for you bud!
